creator: iGroove - Free Music Apps
descriptionHtml:
Drum Machine - Groove & Beat Maker is a feature packed, Step Sequencer based Drum Machine & Groovebox, a Sampler, Drum Pads, and a Mixer.No complicated functions,you can create your own music without garage band and easily become a drummer！

It features quality sounds from the most popular acoustic & advanced digital drum machine such like Roland TR,MPC.The Integrated DJ drum pad will let you have a walk band with you and record the hop beatwave whenever you are.

With our DJ tool you can get maximum enjoyment. If you want to make professional music or just have fun, then this app is perfect for you!

Key Key features：

🎶Easy Step Sequencer

- Easy 16&32 step Sequencer
- Timing & Measure : BPM, Swing Quantization, Time Signature, Measure
- 8 Tracks Beatbox
- Metronome
- Playback / Loop
- Realistic and Clear interface

🎶Preset Library

- 72 Drum Kits
- Different genre:Acoustic,Vintage,Trap,Hip Hop,Jazz,From Roland TR-808,Roland TR-909 to Synth percussion,even 8-bit groove sample
- 50+ Pattern & Loops Loaded anytime

🎶Various Play Options:

- Mixer with up to 8 Channels
- Mixer Effect:Quantify,Mute,Solo,Reverb
descriptionShort: Easy drum machine for rhythm composer. Free sequencer,pad,mixer and presets.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
For better performance
· We added Mix presets for each pattern
· Optimize drum playing techniques which is more anthropomorphic
Fix some bugs

title: Drum Machine - Beat Groove Pad

creator: iGroove - Game Master
descriptionHtml:
Drum Machine - Groove & Beat Maker is a feature packed, Step Sequencer based Drum Machine & Groovebox, a Sampler, Drum Pads, and a Mixer.No complicated functions,you can create your own music without garage band and easily become a drummer！

It features quality sounds from the most popular acoustic & advanced digital drum machine such like Roland TR,MPC.The Integrated DJ drum pad will let you have a walk band with you and record the hop beatwave whenever you are.

With our DJ tool you can get maximum enjoyment. If you want to make professional music or just have fun, then this app is perfect for you!

Key features：

🎶Easy Step Sequencer

- Easy 16&32 step Sequencer
- Timing & Measure : BPM, Swing Quantization, Time Signature, Measure
- 8 Tracks Beatbox
- Metronome
- Playback / Loop
- Realistic and Clear interface

🎶Preset Library

- 72 Drum Kits
- Different genre:Acoustic,Vintage,Trap,Hip Hop,Jazz,From Roland TR-808,Roland TR-909 to Synth percussion,even 8-bit groove sample
- 50+ Pattern & Loops Loaded anytime

🎶Various Play Options:

- Mixer with up to 8 Channels
- Mixer Effect:Quantify,Mute,Solo,Reverb
descriptionShort: Drum machine for beat maker.Drum pad, mixer, hundreds of patterns& soundpacks

title: Drum Machine - Beat Groove Pad

container.value:
Mongkok Kowloon 610 NATHAN ROAD
ROOMS 1318 - 19, 13/F, HOLLYWOOD PLAZA

creator: iGroove - Game Master
descriptionHtml:
🥁 Beat Groove Pad - Drum Machine is not just a drum machine; it's your gateway to musical creativity and expression. Whether you're a seasoned musician or just starting out, our comprehensive suite of features makes it easy to unleash your inner beat maker and produce professional-quality tracks with ease.

Gone are the days of struggling with complicated functions or relying on cumbersome software like garageband. With Beat Groove Pad, creating your own music is as simple as tapping a drum pad. Our intuitive interface and user-friendly design ensure that you can dive straight into crafting beats without any prior experience.

What sets Beat Groove Pad apart is its extensive library of sounds and presets, sourced from the most popular acoustic and digital drum machines on the market. From vintage classics like Roland TR-808 and TR-909 to cutting-edge synth percussion, we've got everything you need to bring your music to life.

But Beat Groove Pad is more than just a drum machine – it's a complete music production tool. With our integrated step sequencer, you can easily create complex rhythms and patterns with just a few taps. And with support for up to 8 tracks on our beatbox, you'll never run out of room to experiment and explore.

🎶 Key Features:

🎶 Easy Step Sequencer

Effortlessly create beats with our intuitive 16 & 32 step sequencer
Customize timing and measure settings with BPM, swing quantization, time signature, and measure options
Access 8 tracks on our beatbox for versatile beat creation
Stay in rhythm with the built-in metronome
Seamlessly playback and loop your beats with our user-friendly interface
🎶 Preset Library

Explore 72 diverse drum kits, ranging from acoustic and vintage to trap, hip hop, jazz, and more
Access over 50 patterns and loops at any time to kickstart your creativity
🎶 Various Play Options:

Mix and blend your beats with up to 8 channels on our mixer
Apply mixer effects such as quantization, mute, solo, and reverb to enhance your sound
Take your music on the go with our integrated DJ drum pad, allowing you to record beats wherever inspiration strikes. Whether you're in the studio or on the move, Beat Groove Pad puts the power of a full-fledged drum machine in the palm of your hand.

Whether you're making professional music or simply having fun, Beat Groove Pad - Drum Machine is the perfect companion for unleashing your musical potential. Download now and start creating your own beats today!
descriptionShort: For music creators. Featuring drum pads, mixers, and a vast array of patterns.

appDetails.developerAddress:
Mongkok Kowloon 610 NATHAN ROAD
ROOMS 1318 - 19, 13/F, HOLLYWOOD PLAZA
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New editor mode available
Fixed some bugs

With our integrated step sequencer, you can easily create complex rhythms and patterns with just a few taps. And with support for up to 8 tracks on our beatbox, you'll never run out of room to experiment and explore.

🎶 Key Features:

🎶 Easy Step Sequencer

Effortlessly create beats with our intuitive 16 & 32 step sequencer
Customize timing and measure settings with BPM, swing quantization, time signature, and measure options
Access 8 tracks on our beatbox for versatile beat creation
Stay in rhythm with the built-in metronome
Seamlessly playback and loop your beats with our user-friendly interface
🎶 Preset Library

Explore 72 diverse drum kits, ranging from acoustic and vintage to trap, hip hop, jazz, and more
Access over 50 patterns and loops at any time to kickstart your creativity
🎶 Various Play Options:

Mix and blend your beats with up to 8 channels on our mixer
Apply mixer effects such as quantization, mute, solo, and reverb to enhance your sound
Take your music on the go with our integrated DJ drum pad, allowing you to record beats wherever inspiration strikes. Whether you're in the studio or on the move, Beat Groove Pad puts the power of a full-fledged drum machine in the palm of your hand.

Whether you're making professional music or simply having fun, Beat Groove Pad - Drum Machine is the perfect companion for unleashing your musical potential. Download now and start creating your own beats today!
descriptionShort: For music creators. Featuring drum pads, mixers, and a vast array of patterns.
